Judgment.text: I carefully analyze situations before making decisions
I consider long-term consequences when making choices
I weigh pros and cons thoroughly before deciding
I remain objective when evaluating options
I seek relevant information before forming opinions
I can identify logical flaws in arguments
I avoid jumping to conclusions without evidence
I consider ethical implications when making decisions
I can prioritize competing factors effectively
I recognize when my biases might affect my judgment
I adjust my views when presented with new information
I can identify the root cause of complex problems

Achievement.text: I set challenging goals for myself
I persist until I achieve my objectives
I take initiative without being prompted
I measure my progress toward goals regularly
I take responsibility for my performance
I seek ways to improve efficiency
I maintain focus on long-term objectives
I celebrate small wins along the way to bigger goals
I bounce back quickly from setbacks
I prioritize tasks based on importance

Relationship.text: I build strong connections with team members
I actively listen to others' perspectives
I provide constructive feedback to others
I treat everyone with respect regardless of status
I recognize and appreciate others' contributions
I adapt my communication style to different audiences
I collaborate effectively in group settings

Learning Agility.text: I quickly adapt to new situations
I actively seek feedback for improvement
I am curious about new ideas and approaches
I apply knowledge from one area to another
I stay current with industry trends and developments
I explore multiple solutions to problems
I embrace change as an opportunity
I seek out challenging learning experiences
I can quickly understand complex new concepts
I regularly reflect on my experiences to improve
